QuestData.Title: They Took Our Gnomes
QuestData.Description: The gnome explosives squad we requested from Tinker Town arrived last week. Just in time to face an assault by the Horde. We lost a lot of soldiers that day. Most of the gnome team was taken as well. Now we're neck deep in Horde, Silverwind Refuge has been lost and we're down a dozen gnomes.$B$BI'm begging for your help here, $n. Travel east to Silverwind Refuge and look for any gnome survivors. They were all carted off by a big, merciless orc named Thundrak. Find him and you'll find our gnomes.
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue Boog the "Gear Whisperer" and Minx from Painmaster Thundrak's Wagon of Unending Agony.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Huntress Jalin at Stardust Spire in Ashenvale.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $n. Grim news you bring of the rest of the gnome team, but at least you managed to save a few. For that I am grateful.
